author: nflaig
content: great, I was able to confirm that block production via `produceBlockV3` works now with Lodestar VC (`chainsafe/lodestar:next`) and Nimbus BN ( `ethpandaops/nimbus-eth2:unstable-c5f04dd`), however there seems to be a regression introduced in Nimbus unstable branch which fails publishing the block via `publishBlockV2`, I opened an issue for it https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/issues/6205.

author: tersec
content: ok, thanks for opening the issue. if it works in everything except `V2`, it should be possible to narrow down

author: tersec
content: you say a regression -- do you mean from a specific commit, or just that in general it doesn't work?

author: nflaig
content: I mean in terms of this issue is not present on `stable` branch

author: nflaig
content: not sure which commit on your unstable branch introduces it tho
